name: places/ChIJOdVqbYf2wokRLb9gKED6LDI
formattedAddress: 1846 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1846 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031-1716, USA

originalText.text: A late review but one that is well deserved. I' a runner and tore my meniscus while training for the NYC half marathon. My doctor referred me here and I did 4 weeks of PT. The team is super professional but also easy to get along with - they worked very well with my schedule and I was there twice a week. Exercises were great and this was both in person and the in app workouts they suggested. I've been stronger since and have since brought some of the exercises into my workout routine. Highly recommend this place and wish the amazing staff all the best.

originalText.text: The entire staff here are kind and patient,  Sarah has a gentle touch, Mirtha greets u with a beautiful smile and Olando is on top of his job. I would recommend anybody and everybody to come to Home Physical Therapy Solutions

text.text: The entire staff here are kind and patient,  Sarah has a gentle touch, Mirtha greets u with a beautiful smile and Olando is on top of his job. I would recommend anybody and everybody to come to Home Physical Therapy Solutions

originalText.text: Everyone in the Manhattan office is so nice and competent. They REALLY decreased my level of daily, chronic pain. Their exercise program and therapy solutions really do work, they are experts are what they do. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who's in pain or could benefit from seeing a physical therapist.

text.text: Everyone in the Manhattan office is so nice and competent. They REALLY decreased my level of daily, chronic pain. Their exercise program and therapy solutions really do work, they are experts are what they do. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who's in pain or could benefit from seeing a physical therapist.

originalText.text: I will highly recommend it to all I wish I am allowed to give it 6 stars! From Mirtha, patient coordinator who makes sure you all set for your appointments and follow ups to Sarah the Physical therapist who is amazing !! to James the physical therapist who recommended me an app to make sure my back pain goes away! to Peter another therapist. I am going to recommend this to my friends and family should they need a physical therapist. Amazing services and yes my back is almost back to normal and I have seen alot of changes to the physical therapy that I received!! keep up the good work!!!

originalText.text:
Professional, caring and knowledgeable staff and therapists. Great physical therapy place !
I picked this place because of a referral from a friend, saying she had a very good experience and they follow the CDC guidelines and safety protocols.   I went there for an injury on my right shoulder.  I wasn't feeling the greatest that day because of the pain I've been having for a while.  The place was easy to find and I was greeted with a smile by the front desk person.  After checking my temperature, she asked me to have a seat.  the seating area is nicely spread out and it was not crowded.  The front desk explained the schedule is controlled so patients are not arriving all at the same time crowding the area.  She helped me fill out the forms understanding it would be difficult for me to write.  I thought that was very nice and thoughtful of her to do that.  Once I was called in by the therapist, he asked me many questions about my injury.  I felt like he truly understood what I was going through and answered all my concerns.  He worked on my shoulder gently yet effective.  After my treatment, I felt content and satisfied with the service I received.  I did the right choice picking this place and will recommend to anyone who is seeking a good professional and caring service.
